marker.comment: Depart NW Creek Marina @ 087 Local time. Hot and Muggy!!! Having fun yet?
ICW Mile 59.5 Expect Norfolk tomorrow. Still hot but wind made all tolerable.
Mile 0 ICW.Norfolk.10.5 hr. Weather nice today. Stay here tomorrow.
Mile 0 ICW.Norfolk.10.5 hr. Weather nice today.At anchor today. Prep for sea.
Departing Norfolk for open sea.
No wind. Motoring @61degrees.Off VA coast
Motor sailing. N and W of entrance to Deleware bay. Beautiful day!
Under MainsailandGenoa.. Dolphins, shearwaters and storm petrals abound. All well.
Fuel low. Under full sail. Spotted a dozen and a half adult whales in Gulf of ME
Whales! One sounded, leaving fluke sticking above sufrace, then slid under waves
Lots of fog.Temp low 60''s at night.Sailing 60% of time. Anchoring tonight.
Underway. Light wind.Motorsailing.Try to be in Bras de Or Lks today
Reached Bras de Or Lakes yesterday afternoon. Anchored.
Arrived at Baddeck.Will be here at least until the 27th
Road trip to NC and back. Arrived today. Still in harbor
RandR in Baddeck. Dingy sailing, bread baking, maintenance and soon fishing
Moving tomorrow about 5 mi west. Looking for elusive cod.
Washabuck River. Fishing report;Cod 1, Ron 0. Discouraged but Will keep trying
Washabuck River. Fishing report;Cod 4, Ron remains 0.Homemade biscuits this am.
A bit of varnishin yesterday. More today.. Back to Baddeck tomorrow.
On mooring in Baddeck. Find out tomorrow or Tue if we can go to Newfoundlend
Enroute Newfoundland .Overnight anc Otter Cove.Adverse Wx expected next 2 days
Anc in Ingonish Hbr Contrary winds tomorrow fr low and effects from Irene
Arrived Isle Aux Morts NFL midnight. Anc in Bay Le Moine today.?storm tomorrow
Anc Bay Le Moine.Gps andCharts don't match. Surveys date from 1890 by Brits
Anc Little Garia Bay Fog rolling inTemp this am 57 In longjohns till afternoon
White Bear Bay. 11 mile long fjord. 1000 ft high Mt with near vertical walls.
28nm E todayRiver Beautiful EaglesandDolphins and Loons+loads of sea birds
Gray River Anchorage Still. Departing in am 35 + hr to Bras D Or and Baddeck
Crossing Cabot Straight. Ride uncomfotable with confused seas.100nm togo
Arrived Baddeck 340EDT. 38 1/2 hr crossing. Tired. to bed early
Back in Baddeck. Getting readt io head south. Hurricane Ophelia hhere yesteray
Planning to cast off in am. Watching weather carefully.
Tied up at E exit Bras D Or lakes. Must pass through locks. ?Wx for tomorrow
Underway this am. Great sail. Anch in Canso Hbr. Hot chowder tonight.
Underway today.Yesterday repaired mainsail rip. Anchored Liscomb Rv tonight
8 hr beating to windward.Are we having fun yet. Anch in Jedddore Hbr
Still anchored in Jeddore. Gale force winds from converging lows. Maybe Wed ?
Underway since 6 am. Anticipate Shelburne, NS around midnight
Arrived Shelburn, NS, 0355 am EDT in thick fog. Thank U 4 radar!
Underway bound for Cape Cod. Expect arrival Sunday
65 NM to Cape Cod, Proviencetown. 10-12 more hours. 2-3am arrival
arrived Proviencetown 4 am. Sleepy!!!!
Departing Provincetown, MA, for S Dartmouth, MA via C Cod canal.
Just N of Newport, RI, visiting for 2 days,Underway again tomorrow
Newport, RI.Waiting out contrary weather window. Next leg, direct C May
anchors not holding ducks. They are lashed to moorings, 35 kt wind in anchorage
